subject: Congratulations My Dear Sole B
body:
Congratulations My Dear Sole Beneficiary, and Good Day
Automated Teller Machine Bank of Africa Financial {ATM} Centers
Cotonou Benin. Head Office: k.m 7/10/ Tunde Motor Road Northerm
Cotonou City, 07036,Republic Benin . From The Disk of Engineer Mrs.
Abialo Maurice, Bawuah Automated Teller Machine.
ATTENTION, Dear
I am Engineer Abialo Maurice, Bawuah, a computer scientist working
with ATM office Authority Benin. Automated Teller Machine {ATM} Center
Bank of Africa Republic Benin am computer scientist in this office, it
was this morning that I was searching some Documents and I  came
across your files. So due to time I quickly picked your email address
and the amount of your Composition/inheritance funds from United
Nations that you supposed to received which is (Sixteen Millions and
Nine Hundred Thousands{$16.900,000.000 USD} because there is many
files there and no time.
I know that this message will come to you as surprised because you
don't know me, but I want to bring solution to your problem. Our
former Director Mr. Ahmed Juliet was treated Christian very bad by not
delivery their ATM card or forwarding fake ATM to Christians due to
religion problem, in order to extracting money from them and that is
why I contacted you so it is confidential within me and you because
the Lord I serve will not let such to happen here in my sent as I want
you to stop any further communication with whoever it may be because
they don’t have your funds cause knows that 
the only fee you will be
paid is the Delivery charge needed on your behalf for the clearance of
your funds
 $175.00 USD when it about to posted getting to you within
48 hours. Meanwhile I have verified with International Monetary Funds,
they said your transaction is genuine.
I am a good Christian and I want to help you to get your fund, if you
can keep it secret and follow my advice, Your ATM card will be
received by you. 
As it is stands now I need your current info avoid
any mistakes on.
FULL NAME...
DELIVERY ADDRESS...
PHONE NUMBER...
CITY...….
COUNTRY...
Regards,
Yours faithfully,
Mrs. Abialo Maurice, Bawuah
Telephone Number Or WhatsApp: +229 -695-15008
Official Email (
unitedbankplc446@gmail.com
Co-Chief Executive Operating Officer, ATM Center Bank of Africa Republic Benin

subject: Re: Congratulations My Dear Sole B
body:
Hello Mrs. Abialo Maurice, Bawuah,

I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your email did indeed come as a surprise! It's not every day that one receives news of such a substantial sum.

I'm curious about the process involved in receiving these funds. Could you please elaborate on how this works? Also, could you provide more information about the delivery charge and how it is calculated?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lewis
